question: Question 44 Let X be a recursive language and Y be a recursively enumerable but not recursive language. Which one of the following statements is TRUE?

options.A: W can be recursively enumerable and Z is recursive.
options.B: W can be recursive and Z is recursively enumerable
options.C: W is not recursively enumerable and Z is recursive
options.D: W is not recursively enumerable and Z is not recursive.
